casebody.data:
In re William F. SAUBER and John H. Montgomery, Jr. No. 02-1159. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Oct. 16, 2002.

Before MICHEL, Circuit Judge, PLAGER, Senior Circuit Judge, and LOURIE, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
